title: Auto-merge social media PRs (Discord, Instagram, highlights, README)
author: Itachi-1824

gist.summary: Enabled auto-merge for routine social media workflows (Instagram, GitHub) to streamline content publishing.
gist.impact: Reduces manual steps for the team, ensuring faster updates for community content while keeping sensitive channels manual.
gist.visual_concept: A cute automated robot arm or conveyor belt sorting mail/papers, representing the new auto-merge workflow. The pollinations.ai bee watches the efficient process.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of a cute automated conveyor belt sorting colorful pixel letters. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel peach gradient background. The pollinations.ai bee watches the smooth process. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic. Organized and efficient.
